data.description:
KungFu VR is a martial arts workout game. Training Kung fu with the best martial artists in the world. Dragon fist, TaiChi, Swordsmanship and more unique design KungFu classes. Through hundreds of full- body KungFu movements to improve your fitness, strength and coordination. Accompanied by unique beat music, workout becomes more fun. 

Game Features:
1, Unique KungFu Themes, 10 different styles of KungFu Themes, including Chinese Fist, Tai Chi, and Chinese Swordsmanship, among others；
2, Professional KungFu movements, over hundreds of unique designs of full-body KungFu movements. experience a wide range of movements and techniques；
3, Fitness more fun, Comprehensively exercise your body's balance, kung fu Technique, Strength, Flexibility, and body coordination；
4, Unique Music, 10 Rhythmic music with Chinese style, inspire your Kung Fu fitness journey；
5, Dreamy Environments, 4 Chinese style dreamy environments，more immersive in Kung Fu experience;
6, Exciting challenge, Online leaderboard & unlock 30 challenging Unique badges.

KungFu VR is a great way to make fitness very fun. What are you waiting for? 
Download “KungFu VR" start your KungFu master journey!
